xwikidoc.name: Translations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Wiki Manager Translations
xwikidoc.content:
# Various translations that are used in the wiki template and, implicitly, in the created wiki.
## MENU core.menu.type.wiki=Wiki core.menu.watchlist.add.wiki=查看Wiki ### Missing: core.menu.watchlist.remove.wiki=Unwatch Wiki core.menu.admin.wiki=管理Wiki
# WIKI INFORMATION PANEL platform.wiki.panel.title=Wiki信息
# MESSAGES platform.wiki.currentwiki.welcome=欢迎来到{0}{1}{2} Wiki. platform.wiki.currentwiki.currentUserIsOwner=你是这个wiki的所有者。 platform.wiki.currentwiki.currentUserIsAdmin=你是这个Wiki的管理员。 platform.wiki.currentwiki.joinNeedToLogin=你需要先登录，才能加入这个Wiki。 platform.wiki.currentwiki.currentUserNotMember=你不是这个Wiki的成员。 platform.wiki.currentwiki.currentuserCanJoin=如果你喜欢这个Wiki {1}，你可以{0}加入它。 platform.wiki.currentwiki.currentUserIsMember=你是这个Wiki的成员。 ### Missing: platform.wiki.currentwiki.currentUserCanLeave=If you like, you can {0}leave this wiki{1}. platform.wiki.currentwiki.gadgetTopActiveUsersAllMembers=通过{0}用户列表{1}，你可以看到所有的Wiki成员。 platform.wiki.currentwiki.invitationPendingForCurrentWiki=你已经被邀请加入这个Wiki。 platform.wiki.currentwiki.joinRequestPendingForCurrentWiki=你已经请求了加入这个Wiki。 platform.wiki.currentwiki.joinRequestAcceptedNotification=你加入Wiki''{0}''的请求已经通过。 platform.wiki.currentwiki.joinRequestRejectedNotification=你请求加入Wiki ''{0}'' 的请求已经被拒绝。 ### Missing: platform.wiki.currentwiki.candidateHandledSaveComment=Handled candidate {0} ({1}) ### Missing: platform.wiki.currentwiki.candidateHandledComment=Comment: platform.wiki.currentwiki.candidateAcceptedSuccess=请求被接受。 platform.wiki.currentwiki.candidateRejectedSuccess=请求被拒绝。 platform.wiki.currentwiki.inviteUserAlreadyMember={0} 现在是Wiki的成员。 ### Missing: platform.wiki.currentwiki.inviteRequestAlreadyExists={0} already has a pending request. Please respond to that request instead. ### Missing: platform.wiki.currentwiki.inviteUserAlreadyInvited={0} already has a pending invitation. ### Missing: platform.wiki.currentwiki.inviteSaveComment=User ''{0}'' has been invited to join the wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.currentwiki.inviteNotification=You have been invited to join the wiki ''{0}''. ### Missing: platform.wiki.currentwiki.inviteSuccess={0} invited successfully. ### Missing: platform.wiki.currentwiki.invitationCancelSaveComment=Cancelled invitation {0} ({1}) ### Missing: platform.wiki.currentwiki.invitationCancelNotification=Your invitation has been cancelled and is no longer valid. ### Missing: platform.wiki.currentwiki.invitationCancelSuccess=Invitation cancelled successfully. ### Missing: platform.wiki.currentwiki.invitationCancelFailure=Error, you cannot cancel this invitation. ### Missing: platform.wiki.currentwiki.candidateReviewFailure=Error, you cannot cancel this invitation.

# HINTS ### Missing: platform.wiki.currentwiki.prop.wikiprettyname.hint=The display name of the wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.currentwiki.prop.description.hint=A brief description of the wiki and its purpose. ### Missing: platform.wiki.currentwiki.prop.owner.hint=A user who has all the rights on the wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.currentwiki.prop.membershipType.hint=The way users can join this wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.currentwiki.prop.secure.hint=If enabled, all this wiki''s generated externals URLs will start with {0}https:~/~/{1}. ### Missing: platform.wiki.currentwiki.invite.username.hint=The name of the user to add to the wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.currentwiki.invite.message.hint=The message to send to the user. ### Missing: platform.wiki.currentwiki.candidates.hint=Users who have requested or been invited to join the wiki.
